snippet.title: Asterix: Caesar's Challenge gameplay (PC Game, 1995)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Asterix: Caesar's Challenge, PC game produced by Infogrames in 1995 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/asterix-caesar-s-challenge/8955/
In this video I am taking up the challenge and playing as both, Asterix and Obelix and defeating the Romans in chapter 1 and chapter 2. A fun game, especially if you have a friend to play with.
Played through modern Windows machine.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Dig Dogs: Streetbusters - https://youtu.be/D0w84VNh3Eg
Timon & Pumbaa's Jungle Games - https://youtu.be/LeYF-st2v20
